title: Peace of Mind
description: You’re safe with us. The privacy and security of your financial information is our top priority.

title: Free Actually free
description: No more pricing grids. No more fine print. Sending and receiving cash is free without gimmicks.

title: Simple payments
description: The same debit card you use to buy coffee lets deposit money straight to your bank account.
